title: CREDIT REPAIR SPECIALIST
job_overview:
We are seeking a detail-oriented Credit Specialist to join our team, we are looking for someone to grow with us! As a Credit Specialist, youâ€™ll play a critical role in helping clients improve their credit scores and achieve financial freedom. Need to see results in 30 days!!!

RESPONSIBILITIES:

-Analyze credit reports and identify errors or areas of improvements
-Utilize Credit Repair Cloud software to manage client files and track progress
-Stay up-to-date on credit laws and regulations, including FCRA and ECOA
-Know how to use Identity IQ for credit refreshing

REQUIREMENTS:

-1+ year of experience in credit repair industry
-Proficiency in Credit Repair Cloud software
-Strong knowledge on credit repair laws and credit disputes
-Good communication skills, organized, problem solving skills and excellent analytical 

WHAT WE OFFER:
-Monthly or Bi-weekly pay 
-After 90 days pay will increase 
-Pay will continue increasing as the company grows

SERIOUS INQUIRIES ONLY!!!
